name: vpet
description: A cross-platform virtual pet application inspired by Digimon and traditional virtual pets

scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p www && cp index.html style.css manifest.json www/ && cp *.js icons -r www/ && rm -f www/*.backup www/*.test.js www/eslint.config.js www/vitest.config.js www/generate-icons.js
scripts.build:quick: mkdir -p www && cp index.html style.css manifest.json www/ && cp *.js icons -r www/ && rm -f www/*.backup www/*.test.js www/eslint.config.js www/vitest.config.js www/generate-icons.js
scripts.android:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
